description.en:
Yuri, a modern day teenager who had just received her first kiss, is suddenly whisked away 
to ancient Anatolia, where an evil queen needs her for a blood sacrifice. 
Thankfully the timely intervention of Prince Kail saves Yuri from the queen's grasp. For now. 
Kail promises to send Yuri back to her home, but the queen's persistent schemes to kill them both, 
plus their growing interest in each other, keep those plans delayed.  

  **Winner of 2001 Shogakukan Manga Award for Shōjo** 

Note: Final 28th volume contains a side story called Orontes Renka, set in the same historical period.  
 
The Hittite empire is about to become an Egyptian territory through marriage between the Hittite princess and the Egyptian king. 
A traveler from Egypt, Maripas, visits Anatolia at that time but gets robbed of all his belongings while playing good samaritan. 
He's thankfully offered shelter by an unusually well-educated Hittite woman named Yuri. 
But this seemingly innocent meeting soon turns into a thrilling romantic adventure – 
cases of mistaken identity and runaway royals are about to complicate international relations!

description.en: Overflowing wealth, exceptional looks. Ilya Bloden's life was perfect.Until she witnessed her fiancé's affair, that is."I changed everything, my taste, my hobbies, I accommodated his every wish… But I won't live like a pushover any longer. I'll get a perfect break up!"For the perfect break up, she finds a new fiancé, Karhan Evantheon. She tried to shield herself with Karhan's fearsome reputation, but…"I found this flower on the battlefield, and I really wanted Illya to see it."Turns out, he was a cute puppy?! Will this engagement be okay?

altTitles.zh-hk: 轉生者才能駕馭的極限天賦 —Over Limit Skill Holder—

description.en:
A fantasy adventure about bonds forged with people in a different world. The setting is a world, where everyone has eight skill slots. In these slots people can put skills like “Strengthen arm ★” and “Fire Magic★★” from skill orbs, abilities which prove extremely useful for survival. The total amount of stars your skills have can never exceed your slots. Our protagonist Reiji, worked as a slave that mines skill orbs, until 10 years old. Along with his precious older sister, Lark, they worked gruellingly in the mines until one day, where the chance for rebellion occurred at the mine and Reiji got his hands on a ten-star, a so called “overlimit” skill, called “World Ruler”. Reiji went from a powerless slave to having an ability that surpassed human limits, but in the chaos of the revolt, he was separated from the only person dear to him, his sister Lark.  
  
“To regain his bond with her, to make her his true sister”, earnestly thinking so, Reiji’s adventure to distant places starts!

---

description.ja:
"契約魔術"によって拘束され、鉱山で奴隷として働かされていた10歳の少年・レイジ。姉貴分の少女奴隷・ラルクと共に"天賦珠玉（スキルオーブ）"を採掘するだけの人生を送っていた彼は、鉱山で起こった暴動をきっかけに"あらゆる事象を一瞬で理解"し、さらには"他者のスキルをコピー"できるという最強の感知＆ラーニングスキル【森羅万象（ワールド・ルーラー）】を入手。同時に自身が元々17歳の高校生であり、事故死から蘇った異世界転生者であることを知った。

レイジはスキルの力を活かして鉱山を脱出するものの、たった一人の仲間だったラルクと決別してしまう。いつかラルクと再会し、本当の姉弟になることを胸に誓って――レイジの果てしない冒険が始まる!!

description.en:
"И на меня тоже обрати внимание..."

Alya, the incomparably beautiful silver-haired girl in the next seat over, occasionally mumbles to herself in Russian. She says she switches to it whenever she’s badmouthing me… but I know the truth! I know for a fact that she just said "Pay attention to me, too." to me! 

Masachika Kuze has native-level skills when it comes to Russian comprehension, but Alya has no idea about that... and that’s why she keeps on hiding those sweet feelings about him in her native language!
description.it: Masachika Kuze è seduto accanto ad Alya, una ragazza di origine russa e antenati giapponesi. Lei è bella, altezzosa e una studentessa eccezionale, mentre Masachika è secchione e noto per essere un fannullone. È un bersaglio facile per i suoi commenti in russo, che lei è fin troppo felice di tradurre - tranne per il fatto che lui può capire cosa sta dicendo in realtà!
description.ja: 「И на меня тоже обрати внимание」隣の席に座る絶世の銀髪美少女、アーリャさんは時々ロシア語を話す。本人は俺を罵倒していると言うのだが…事実は違う！さっきのロシア語、彼女は「私のことかまってよ」と言っていたのだ！実は俺、久世政近のロシア語リスニングはネイティブレベルなのである。そんな事とは露知らず、今日も甘々なロシア語でデレてくるアーリャさん！全生徒憧れの的、超ハイスペックなロシアンJKとの青春ラブコメディ！
description.pl: Masachika Kuze siedzi obok Alyi, dziewczyny pochodzenia rosyjsko - japońskiego. Jest piękną, wyniosłą i wyjątkową uczennicą, podczas gdy Masachika jest kujonem znanym z bycia leniem. Jest on więc łatwym celem dla jej komentarzy, które chętnie tłumaczy na rosyjski - z wyjątkiem tego, że on może zrozumieć, co mówi naprawdę!
description.ru: Манга по одноимённой новелле! Главный герой – Кудзе Масачика, учится в частном институте Сейрей, куда частенько попадают ученики из разных стран. Вдруг в классе Кудзе появилась новенькая. Девушка с бледной, почти прозрачной кожей, которую невозможно было увидеть у настоящих японцев, и длинными голубыми глазами-щелочками, сияющими, как сапфиры. Это была Аля – Русская девушка, что переехала в Японию...
description.vi:
“И наменятоже обрати внимание”

“Hở, gì thế?”

“Có gì đâu? Tôi nói ‘Cái tên này đúng là đồ ngốc’ ý mà.”

“Cậu thôi cái trò mắng người ta bằng tiếng Nga đi!?”

Arya - cô nàng xinh đẹp tuyệt trần có mái tóc bạch kim ngồi cạnh tôi - đang nở một nụ cười đắc thắng...

Nhưng sự thật thì, câu tiếng Nga cô ấy vừa nói có nghĩa là [Hãy để ý đến tôi đi] cơ!

Tôi - Kuze Masachika - là người có khả năng nghe hiểu tiếng Nga thông thạo như người bản xứ. Nhưng không hề hay biết điều đó, cô nàng Arya hôm nay vẫn tiếp tục thể hiện những cảm xúc rất ngọt ngào bằng tiếng Nga khiến tôi không thể ngừng cười!?

Câu chuyện tình thanh xuân hài hước của tôi với cô nàng nữ sinh trung học gốc Nga hoàn hảo đã bắt đầu như thế...
description.pt-br:
Minha colega de classe que senta ao meu lado é meio-russa, chamada Alya, ela tá sempre provocando e sussurrando em russo, só que ela não sabe que entendo muito bem o idioma russo. 

Assim começa um grande comédia romântica.

description.en: From Miyagi to the bustling life of a Tokyo high school, Machi Nishina wanted anything but the ordinary. Her wish is granted in the most unexpected way when she encounters Oboro Kasumi, a classmate harboring a secret, who ends up following her home...?! A new era of friendship and youthful comedy unfolds!
description.pt-br: De Miyagi à vida agitada de uma escola secundária de Tóquio, Machi Nishina queria tudo menos o comum. Seu desejo é atendido da forma mais inesperada quando ela encontra Oboro Kasumi, um colega de classe que guarda um segredo, que acaba seguindo sua casa...?! Uma nova era de amizade e comédia juvenil se desenrola!

title.en: Gendai no Saikyou Heishi, Isekai Dungeon o Kouryaku Suru

altTitles.ja: 現代の最強兵士、異世界ダンジョンを攻略する

altTitles.en: The Modern Era's Strongest Soldier Conquers Another World's Dungeon

description.en: Hasumi Ryuuji, the man called “the modern era’s strongest soldier”, someone who can make numerous difficult strategies a success, was transferred during a mission into the depths of another world’s dungeon. A “heavenly voice” echoed inside his brain guiding him — “Welcome, the hero from another world” — as he encounters a scene in which adventurers are being attacked by monsters. However, making good use of his superior physical abilities, discernment, and hand-to-hand combat abilities, he succeeds in easily making quick work of the monsters. In this other world, where adventurers are existences weaker than monsters, Hasumi, who can suppress his target even with just a knife, was someone regarded as a hero due to his outstanding abilities. Hasumi decides to cooperate with the adventurers he rescued, but they are attacked by a dragon, falling into a critical situation. Nevertheless, he leads his flustered comrades, coordinate them and makes an attack opportunity to appear. Moreover, after he summons modern firearms with a “weapon summoning” item, he kills the dragon in one shot by accurately targeting its weak spot. In front of this man’s tempered body and intellect, someone who is asked “Who the heck are you?” answers “I’m just a soldier”, even the mythical-grade dungeon is not a threat?! The curtain rises for the story of an ex-special forces soldier turned adventurer challenging another world!

description.cs: Kdysi dávno byly dvě země, oddělené od sebe vysokou zdí. Země Uvnitř, kde žili lidé, a země Venku, obývaná prokletými bytostmi. Prokletí se šířilo dotykem – a tak každého, kdo vkročil do země Venku, čekal přísný trest. I přes to však v zemi Venku žila malá dívenka jménem Šiva. Nebyla sama – starala se o ni prokletá bytost, pan učitel. Ti dva se nesměli dotknout, avšak poutalo je k sobě více, než by se na první pohled mohlo zdát.
description.de: Die Welt ist geteilt in das Innere Land, in dem die Menschen leben und das Fremde Land, das von grotesken Wesen bewohnt wird. Berührt man sie, wird man verflucht. Doch als sich die Wege des kleinen Mädchens Shiva mit dem eines Monsters kreuzen, beginnt leise ihre herzerwärmende Geschichte…
description.en:
*It is a tale full of sorrow. From now let's recite a slow and beautiful story from long ago.*

Shiva, a young girl who loves to stroll about in the countryside, lives in an otherwise deserted village with her guardian, a wendigo-like gentleman known only as “Teacher.” He forbids her from going outside, so she won't be cursed, but Shiva's curiosity makes her yearn for more. What is really behind the mystery of the curse from the Outside?

---
In a world split between the Inside and the Outside, those living in both realms are told never to cross over to the other side, lest they be cursed. A young girl named Shiva lives on the other side, in a vacant village with a demonic guardian known only as "Teacher." Although the two are forbidden to touch, they seem to share a bond that transcends their disparate appearances. But when Shiva leaves Teacher’s care to seek out her grandmother, the secret behind her mysterious living arrangement comes to light.
description.es:
No debería haberla tocado. Pero una mano fría y negra, ajena a la del doctor, ha rozado la mejilla de Shiva. La frágil niña duda ante la posibilidad de haber sido maldita y convertirse en un ser exterior, mientras que el doctor no puede evitar sentirse horrorizado… En medio de una silenciosa confusión, el ser del exterior que ha tocado a la niña susurra una enigmática palabra: madre.

Esto es la mañana y la noche. Y entre el profundo abismo que los separa, una fábula de dos…

---
Hace mucho, mucho tiempo, en un lugar muy lejano había dos paí­ses. El país exterior en el que habitan uno seres anómalos que si te tocan te contagian una m aldición, y un país in­terior en el que habitan los humanos. Lo normal habría sido que nunca se hubieran conocido, pero su encuentro desencadenará a escondidas, una pe­queña historia.

Esto es la mañana y la noche.
description.fr: Il y a très longtemps, dans une contrée lointaine, existaient deux pays... «L'intérieur,» où vivaient les humains, et «l'extérieur,» où habitaient des créatures monstrueuses qu'il ne fallait surtout pas toucher, sous peine de subir la malédiction. Cette histoire commence le jour où se sont rencontrés deux êtres qui n'auraient jamais dû se croiser... Ils sont aussi différents que le jour et la nuit... Et malgré tout ce qui les sépare, malgré les ténèbres qui les entourent, ils vont écrire petit à petit une fable tous les deux...
description.it:
Questa è una triste e malinconica - eppure bellissima - storia di molto tempo fa.  
Shiva è una bambina che vive in un villaggio deserto assieme al suo guardiano, un gentiluomo dall'aspetto simile ad un Wendigo. Lui le proibisce di uscire, per timore che venga maledetta. Ma la piccola Shiva esidera esplorare il mondo oltre la sua piccola bolla protettiva…

---
Un tempo, in una terra molto lontana, vi erano due regni. In uno, "l'esterno", risiedevano creature dall'aspetto grottesco il cui tocco portava una maledizione. Nell'altro, "l'interno", c'era un rifugio sicuro per gli esseri umani. L'incontro fatidico tra due abitanti dei regni in guerra, che non avrebbero mai potuto incontrarsi, fa sbocciare la nostra piccola storia.
description.ja:
昔々、遠く遥けき地に二つの国ありて――。
触れると呪われるという異形の者棲まう『外』と、人間が住まう
『内』で分かたれた世界。
本来であれば、交わらぬはずのふたりが出会った時、
小さな物語が密やかに動き出す。

これは朝と夜――その深い断絶の宵に佇む、ふたりの御伽話……。
description.pl: W świecie podzielonym przez okrutną klątwę mała dziewczynka imieniem Siva została porzucona w lesie zamieszkałym przez przeklęte istoty. Przed niechybną śmiercią ratuje ją tajemniczy rogaty mistrz, który bierze dziecko w opiekę. Czy jednak długo będzie mógł chronić Sivę, jeśli nawet jego dotyk może zarazić dziewczynkę złym czarem?
description.pt: Em um país dividido entre pessoas normais e seres amaldiçoados, Shiva é uma menininha que foi acolhida por uma estranha criatura meio animal e meio humana. Sensei, como é chamado, não pode ser tocado e vive fora da cidade. Afastado do convívio com os demais e ciente dos perigos e maldições que os rodeiam, Sensei alerta Shiva para que ela não saia sozinha. Porém, quando a menininha decide reencontrar sua tia desaparecida, regras são quebradas — e a vida que eles conheciam é colocada em risco.
description.uk: Здавна світ було поділено на дві частини: Потойбіччя, де мешкали моторошні істоти - кожен, хто їх торкався, був проклятий; і Внутрішнє, де мешкали люди. Мешканці двох різних світів ніколи б не зустрілися, якби не випадок, який започаткував їхню таємну історію. Це казка про тих, що завмерли в передзахідних сутінках, що навіки розділили ранок і вечір.
description.vi:
"Nán lại buổi chạng vạng, chia cách ngày và đêm, là câu chuyện về họ". - Hãy cùng nhớ về miền kí ức xa xưa tuyệt đẹp, đong đầy hạnh phúc mà miên man nỗi buồn.
Shiva là cô bé luôn thích đi rong chơi mọi chốn xung quanh. Em sống nơi rìa rừng vắng vẻ cùng với Thầy - một người giám hộ có hình thù kì lạ. Thầy luôn cấm Shiva ra ngoài để không vận phải lời nguyền rủa, nhưng điều đó chẳng thể nào ngăn cản được sự tò mò của em. Sự bí ẩn đằng sau Vùng Ngoài là gì?
description.pt-br: Era uma vez uma criança e um não-humano maldito, vindos de dois mundos diferentes. A história de uma maldição. Shiva, uma jovem garota que adora passear pelo campo, vive em uma vila abandonada com seu guardião. Ele a proíbe de sair da vila para que ela não seja amaldiçoada, mas a curiosidade da Shiva a faz ansiar o mundo exterior. Sobre o que é essa maldição?
description.zh-hk:
從前，在遠方有兩個國家｜｜
世界被分成兩邊，一邊是據說有怪物棲息，只要一碰到怪物就會受到詛咒的「外」，另一邊是人類所居住的「內」。一個全身漆黑的怪物「老師」，與一個被拋棄的小女孩「汐華」，原本不會有機會相遇的兩個人相遇了。這時，小小的故事便悄悄地開始展開了。
這是深深將白天與夜晚分隔開來的｜｜
佇立在天黑之後的兩人之間的童話故事……

altTitles.en: Mysterious Mayuri-san

altTitles.ja: 不思議のまゆりさん

description.en:
Yuusuke, a 7th grader, is interested in his friend's older sister for various reasons.
The older sister, while a little strange, is a kind and caring girl.
She's mysterious but is popular with everyone.  
This is an ordinary comedy about Mayuri-san's mysterious everyday life.

altTitles.zh-ro: Ai Yu Sha Yi Zhi Ye

altTitles.en: Night of Love and Murder
Night of Love and Murderous Intent

description.en: A decade ago, he was a beta at the pinnacle of his assassin career. But one day, while trying to save an Alpha child, he suffered severe injuries leading him to lose the sharpness and insight an assassin needs. Left with no choice, he retired and moved into a remote small town to start a new life under a new identity. Everything was going well until an unexpected visitor showed up at his house. The child he had saved years ago has now grown into the leader of an organization, and he’s coming after the beta with a powerful intent—

title.en: Saikyou de Saisoku no Mugen Level Up ~Sukiru [Keiken-chi 1000-bai] to [Level Free] de Level Jougen no Kase ga Hazureta Ore wa Musou Suru~

altTitles.ja: 最強で最速の無限レベルアップ　～スキル【経験値１０００倍】と【レベルフリー】でレベル上限の枷が外れた俺は無双する～

altTitles.en: The Strongest and Fastest Unlimited Level Up: With the Skills [1000x Exp] and [Level Free], I Broke the Upper Level Limit and Rose to the Top!

description.en:
Makoto Sakura, sixteen years old, finds himself without a place after dropping out of high school. Suddenly, an otherworldly relic appears before him. On that day, dungeons began to appear all over the world. Humans acquired a level system that completely overturned their previous values. Amidst this revolution, Makoto finds his place inside the dungeons.

Acquiring cheat skills like “Experience Points x1000” and “Level Free,” he becomes a level 10,000 powerhouse. As the strongest “Player,” he embarks on dungeon exploration!

altTitles.ja: ダイヤモンドの功罪

description.en: Despite his athletic gifts, Ayasegawa Jiro is a loner who causes others to lose or give up on their dreams, all because of him. While struggling with his loneliness, he discovers the "Bambies," an uncompetitive baseball team whose motto is "having fun." Jiro finds joy in his baseball life with his teammates, but...This is a baseball youth drama that explores the relationship between a genius and his peers.

title.en: Genkai OL to Joshi Daisei ga 〇〇 Suru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 限界OLと女子大生が〇〇する話

altTitles.en: An OL at Her Limit and a College Girl

description.en: Segawa-san is the star of the office who everyone depends on. But she's stretched thin, and the state of her apartment has gotten dire. After a fateful encounter, the college student next door offers to lend a helping hand!
description.ja: 仕事ができて皆から頼られる完璧OL 瀬川さん。しかし家では、汚部屋で毎日コンビニ飯を食べる限界生活を送っていた。ある日、お隣に住む片付け上手でしっかり者の女子大生 安藤さんに部屋の片付けを手伝ってもらうことになり…？

title.en: Door no Mukou ni wa Romance

altTitles.en: Romance is Just Behind the Door
Romance is over the door

altTitles.ja: ドアの向こうにはロマンス

description.en: When Kagami calls an escort service to a hotel one night, the guy who shows up at his door turns out to be precisely his type. But his elation at this stroke of luck soon vanishes as he realizes that Minato is, in fact, a food delivery boy who has come to his room by mistake. Unable to pass up this one-time chance, Kagami plants a kiss on Minato as a joke... But when Minato serendipitously shows up to deliver food to his house the next day, Kagami finds himself drawn more and more to this sweet and straightforward boy…

altTitles.ja: カジノグイ

description.en:
Gen Suzuki, a young man who grew up in an orphanage, is trying to live an honest life.  
But when the cruel reality of the 10 million yen debt from her sister hits him, he decides to rob a Dark Casino.  
What awaits him is the baptism of the underworld!

title.en: Kono Kaisha ni Suki na Hito ga Imasu

altTitles.ja: この会社に好きな人がいます

altTitles.ja-ro: Kono Kaisha ni Suki na Hito ga Imasu

altTitles.en: I Have a Crush at Work

altTitles.zh-ro: Zhè gōngsī yǒu wǒ xǐhuān de rén

altTitles.th: บริษัทนี้มีความรัก

description.en:
_"Why don't the two of us date? …In secret"_
 
Tateishi, who works in accounting at a snack-making company, has a secret. That secret is the existence of his cute lover that he's had since yesterday. Why keep it a secret, you ask? Because his lover is his unyielding colleague from the planning department of the same company— Mitsuya!
 
A pure office romance story about a couple who started their relationship in secret, and want to keep it that way!
description.ja: 「俺たち、付き合わない？……内緒で」お菓子メーカーの経理部に勤めるアラサー男子・立石には、秘密があった。それは、昨日できたばかりの、かわいい恋人の存在。なぜなら相手は、同じ会社の企画部で働く勝気な同期女子・三ツ谷だから――！　してないひとも、あこがれてるひとも、迷惑してるひとも、きっと言いたいことがある。ちょっとは覗いてみたくなる。秘密厳守のピュア社内恋愛ストーリー！
description.pt-br:
"Por que nós dois não namoramos? ... Em segredo"
  
Tateishi, que trabalha na contabilidade de uma empresa que faz lanches, tem um segredo. Esse segredo é a existência de sua amante fofa que ele teve desde ontem. Por que manter isso em segredo, você pergunta? Porque sua amante é sua colega inflexível do departamento de planejamento da mesma empresa - Mitsuya!
  
Uma história de puro romance de escritório sobre um casal que começou seu relacionamento em segredo e quer mantê-lo assim!

altTitles.ja: 少年のアビス

altTitles.en: World End Boy Meets Girl

description.en:
In a town with nothing, in the middle of a daily life with seemingly no signs of change, high schooler Reiji Kurose was "just" living. Family, dreams for the future, childhood friends were all binding him down to that city. He thought he would "just" keep on living like that.

Until he met her.

Is there hope in living? Is there light waiting ahead?

It's the start of a boy meets girl series which reflects the "now."
description.fr:
Dans une ville vide, au milieu d'une vie quotidienne répétitive, Reiji Kurose, lycéen, ne faisait que " vivre". 
Sa famille, ses rêves d'avenir, ses amis d'enfance. Tous ces éléments le liaient à cette ville. 
Il pensait qu'il continuerait "juste" à vivre jusqu'à la fin, jusqu'à ce qu'il la rencontre. 
Y a-t-il de l'espoir dans la vie ? Y a-t-il de la lumière dans l'avenir ? 
C'est le début d'une série de rencontres entre garçons et filles qui reflète le présent!
description.ru: В пустом городке, в разгаре своей повседневной жизни, казалось бы, "просто" жил старшеклассник Рэйдзи Куросе. Семья, мечты о будущем, друзья детства - все это привязывало его к своему родному городу. Он думал, что будет продолжать так жить и никогда ничего не изменит. Пока он не встретил ту самую. Есть ли надежда в жизни? Есть ли впереди свет? Это начало серии "мальчик, повстречавший девочку", которая отражает "сейчас".
description.tr: Reiji Kurose, hiçbir şeyin olmadığı ve görünüşe bakılırsa hiçbir değişimin de olmayacağı bir kasabada ot gibi yaşıyordu. Ailesi, gelecek hayalleri ve çocukluk arkadaşları... Hepsi onu o şehre zincirliyordu. Kendince böyle yaşar giderim diyordu. Taa ki onunla tanışıncaya dek. Yaşamanın bir manası var mı? Beni bekleyen bir gelecek var mı? Oğlan ve kızın tanışmasıyla trajedi kapıları aralanır...
description.vi: Một bộ truyện đầy u ám cùng tác giả với Hatsukoi Zombie. Trong một thị trấn nhàm chán và ngày qua ngày không có gì thay đổi, Reiji Kurose, một học sinh trung học vốn luôn "sống" như "đã chết". Gia đình, tương lai, bạn thời thơ ấu. Tất cả đều trói buộc cậu vào thị trấn này. Cậu luôn nghĩ bản thân đã "chết" cho đến khi gặp được cô gái ấy. Hy vọng nào thắp sáng cho cuộc đời tăm tối của hai người? câu chuyện về hành trình tìm đến "cái chết" để được "sống" chính thức bắt đầu.

title.en: Kanojo ga Onii-chan ni Nattara Shitai 10 no Koto

altTitles.ja: 彼女がお兄ちゃんになったらしたい10のこと

altTitles.en: 10 Things I’d Want to Do if She Becomes My Big Brother

description.en: As a result of entering high school, Nanase moves into a sharehome. Only, there is a special rule that states "all the residents must be assigned a family role"!! What will happen of Nanase's life as she starts living with her pretend family...!?

RENAISSANCE, LIFE, DEATH, ASTRAL DISINTEGRATION.
RENAISSANCE, LIFE, DEATH, ASTRAL DISINTEGRATION.
RENAISSANCE, LIFE, DEATH, ASTRAL DISINTEGRATION.

All beings in the firmament live locked in this infinite cycle. Or so it was until the day they came down from the heavens.

Humanity ceased to be human. Death is no longer the end. Enlightenment came to save her children and defeat the most powerful feeling that consciousness had been able to create.

___

SpaceDrum shows us a society that has evolved to a state of full well-being, freed from wars and conflicts, in search of Nirvana, thanks to the spiritual guidance of an alien race.
The aryas are an elite group charged with the external security of the planet and the protection of the high priestess.

They are chosen because, thanks to their control over their Virya, they are able to control mysterious fragments, the shards. Reda is a student at one of the most distinctive military academies, but he has difficulty controlling his special shard due to constant visions of a strange young woman. And this will not be the biggest of your problems...

altTitles.en: Rainbows After Storms

altTitles.ja: はなにあらし

description.en: Unbeknownst to their friends and classmates, Nanoha and Chidori are dating. Watch as they try to keep their relationship secret!
description.es: A las espaldas de sus amigas y compañeras the salón, Nanoha y Chidori están saliendo juntas. ¡Velas tratando de mantener su relación en secreto!

altTitles.ja: ねずみの初恋

altTitles.en: Nezumi's First Love

description.en:
Nezumi is a girl who was raised as a hitman by the yakuza and grew up not knowing human love. An ordinary young man, Ao, knows nothing. They fall in love and start to live together, but the evil hand is close at hand... This is a story of first love, so cruel and so sad.

Read the prequel oneshot featuring Messiah-chan's backstory [here](https://mangadex.org/title/a53ff4b3-1514-4b91-9fa0-acd99dd797de/gomennasai-messiah-chan).
description.fr: Nezumi est une fille qui a été élevée comme tueuse à gages par les yakuzas et qui a grandi sans connaître l'amour humain. Un jeune homme ordinaire, Ao, n'en sait rien. Ils tombent amoureux et commencent à vivre ensemble, mais la main du mal est proche.... C'est l'histoire d'un premier amour, si cruel et si triste.
description.ja: ヤクザに殺し屋として育てられ、人の愛を知らずに育った少女、ねずみ。何も知らない普通の青年、碧(あお)。二人は恋に落ち、共に暮らし始めるが、魔の手はすぐそこまで迫っていた‥‥。

altTitles.en: Hallym Gymnasium

description.en: Tired of being picked on, Yeongha, the new transfer student, decides to fight back… and discovers he can pack a punch. He soon becomes the top of the food chain, savoring his new title as the toughest guy at school. But he meets his match when Suho Kang, the Champion of the PVP games, single-handedly takes down him and his crew. To earn back his honor, Yeongha decides to join the PVP games. Will he finally get the satisfaction of beating Suho up? Or will he gain something more?
description.tr: Okula yeni transfer olan Yeongha, sürekli olarak kendisinin ve arkadaşlarının zorbalığa uğramasından bıkmıştı. Bu duruma karşı koymak için kararlılıkla harekete geçti ve kendi elinin ne kadar ağır olduğunu keşfetti. Kısa sürede, okulda ki herkesi ezerek en güçlü çocuk ünvanının tadını çıkardı. Ancak PVP oyunlarının şampiyonu Suho Kang, onun ve ekibinin karşısına tek başına çıktığında, Yeongha gerçek gücünün sınırlarını anlamak zorunda kaldı. Onurunu ve Ünvanını geri kazanmak için PVP oyunlarına katılmaya karar veren Yeongha, sonunda Suho’yu yenmeyi başarabilecek midir?

description.en:
When vlogger meets top-of-the-industry writer, what could go wrong? Everything! Nothing has gone my way ever since meeting her.

Hu Luoluo, on the brink of having her vlogger account relinquished, is shoved into the path of scandal-ridden writer extraordinaire Song Li purely by accident. Being featured on hot topics, paired up as a couple, finally gaining traffic... Will it finally make her the greatest vlogger of all time?
description.es-la: Juntos o se hunden juntos, ¿se descubrirán mentiras sobre el amor? Están ligados por negocios, fingiendo ser pareja para contrarrestar los escándalos del escritor y lograr ser el primer lugar en el buscador.

title.en: Yuusha Party ni Kawaii Ko ga Ita no de, Kokuhaku Shite Mita

altTitles.ja: 勇者パーティーにかわいい子がいたので、告白してみた。

altTitles.en: There Was a Cute Girl in the Hero's Party, so I Tried Confessing to Her

altTitles.uk: Красуня з групи героя, якій я зізнався в коханні

altTitles.zh: 身为魔族的我想向勇者小队的可爱女孩告白

altTitles.ko: 용사 파티에 귀여운 애가 있어서, 고백해봤다

description.en: Youki was reincarnated in another world. However, instead of being reincarnated as the hero or the demon lord, he was instead reincarnated half-assedly as a minion of the Demon Lord. One day, the Hero's Party attacked the Demon Lord's castle with the intent of defeating the Demon Lord. Of course, Youki was able to repel their attempt with ease. In spite of this, he ended up falling for the cleric, Cecilia, at first sight… The super popular love comedy fantasy set in another world!
description.uk: Юкі був реінкарнованим у іншому світі. Однак, замість того щоб реінкарнувати героєм чи королем демонів, він став підлеглим короля демонів. Одного дня група героя атакувала замок короля демонів. Годі й казати, що Юкі відбив спробу героя. Однак, з першого погляду, був зачарований красою Сесиль, клерка групи героя... Супер популярна любовна комедія в іншому світі!
description.pt-br: Youki foi reencarnado em outro mundo. Entretanto, em vez de reencarnar como o herói ou o Rei Demônio, ele foi reencarnado como um subordinado do Rei Demônio. Um dia, o grupo do Herói atacou o castelo do Rei Demônio com a intenção de derrotar o Rei Demônio. É claro que Youki conseguiu repelir sua tentativa com facilidade. Apesar disso, ele acabou se apaixonando pelo sacerdotisa Cecília, à primeira vista. A fantasia super popular de comédia romântica que acontece em outro mundo!

title.en: Kyoukai Meikyuu to Ikai no Majutsushi

altTitles.en: Boundary Labyrinth and the Foreign Magician

altTitles.ja: 境界迷宮と異界の魔術師

altTitles.zh: 境界迷宫与异界魔术师

altTitles.ru: Пограничный лабиринт и маг из другого мира

altTitles.zh-hk: 境界迷宮與異界魔術師

description.en: When Theodore was dropped into a waterway by his half-brother, he suddenly recalled the memory of his past life. He had been a Japanese citizen known as Kirishima Kagehisa, placed inside VRMMO character he had made in Break Force Online. "Theodore" is a Combat Mage that Kagehisa played within BFO, and he realized his skills were progressing well even in this other world. Theodore, who had lightly brushed off his half-brother to make his own place in the world, had ventured off to the large labyrinth existing at the Boundary City, Termuilles.

title.en: The Man Living with A Ghost in A Mysterious House

altTitles.ja: いわくつき物件に平然と住む男と幽霊の話

altTitles.hu: A férfi, aki egy szellemmel él együtt egy rejtélyes házban

altTitles.en: Solo Spell Caster
I Alone Cast Spells

altTitles.ja: 俺だけが呪文使い

description.en:
The world is under threat from interdimensional monsters, and only the chosen Awakened - humans possessed of special powers - can defeat them!

Sure, it sounds exciting, but it’s a far cry from reality for ordinary office worker Park Dohyeok, who’s more worried about landing a big business deal that could save his job. That is, until one day when Dohyeok’s path crosses a monster outbreak, causing him to manifest his true powers as a rare and powerful form of Awakened!

With his newfound abilities attracting eager allies and powerful enemies, will Dohyeok find that he has what it takes to survive?
description.it: Il mondo è minacciato da mostri interdimensionali e solo i prescelti "Risvegliati" - esseri umani dotati di poteri speciali - possono sconfiggerli! Certo, sembra eccitante, ma è molto lontano dalla realtà per il normale impiegato Dohyeok Park, che è più preoccupato di concludere un grosso affare che potrebbe salvargli il posto di lavoro. Questo fino a quando, un giorno, la strada di Dohyeok si incrocia con un'epidemia di mostri che gli fa manifestare i suoi veri poteri come una rara e potente forma di Risvegliato. Con le sue nuove capacità che attirano alleati desiderosi e potenti nemici, Dohyeok scoprirà di avere ciò che serve per sopravvivere?
description.ja:
平凡なサラリーマンとして日々を送っていた白虎到（はくと いたる）。 絶体絶命の危機に晒された瞬間、あれほど望んでいた覚醒者に！ しかも、２０代全てをゲームに注いだあの時の記憶と経験が覚醒の能力になるとは！！！ さらに、なんと10億分の1の確率と言われている「トリプル覚醒者」に！ 世界の頂点（トップ）を目指す呪文使い「白虎到」の奇想天外の活躍ストーリーが今、始まります。

---

description.ko:
평범한 샐러리맨으로 살아가는 박도혁,
절체절명의 위기에 빠진 순간 그토록 원하던 각성자가 되었다!
그것도 20대 인생을 바친 게임의 기억과 경험이 내 각성 능력이 되다니!!!

더구나, 10억분의 1인 확률이라는
“무려 트리플 각성자! "

세계 최고의 정점을 노리는
주문 사용자 박도혁의 기상천외한 활약기가 지금 바로 시작됩니다.

****************
청초작가님의 인기 웹소설 본격 웹툰화

---

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/74467)
description.ru:
"Было бы здорово, если бы я смог использовать все эти способности в жизни!"
Я думал, что исполнить это желание не под силу даже Богу, но в момент смертельной опасности, похоже он услышал меня.
Самое время сыграть в реальность!
Да, теперь я единственный, кто использует заклинания!

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%98-%ED%99%80%EB%A1%9C-%EC%A3%BC%EB%AC%B8-%EC%82%AC%EC%9A%A9%EC%9E%90/2436)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/74467)

altTitles.en: Talent-Swallowing Magician

description.en:
The descendant of a once great wizarding family, Elric Mervinger is unable to perform magic due to a rare medical condition.

While attempting to cure his disease, he stumbles upon the demon Mephistopheles, who tries to possess Elric to free himself from a dragon’s trap. But when Elric ends up absorbing Mephisto instead, the two become bound together.

With Mephisto by his side, will this new power allow Elric to restore his family to its former glory? Or will he just end up being devoured?

---
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q5aQzOSvSDw)
description.fr:
Elric Melvinger.
L’unique héritier de la prestigieuse famille magique.
Bien qu’il possédait un talent inné, il avait trop de talent, et de ce fait, ne pouvait pas apprendre la magie. Cependant, il a alors reçu une bénédiction laissée par ses ancêtres !

[Manger des démons.]
[Avaler des démons.]
[Boire des démons.]
[Continue d’accumuler des démons en toi, et réalise une nouvelle magie !]

Élève-toi.
Va si haut que personne ne pourra jamais t’atteindre.
description.ko:
"어이, 메피. 여기 언령마법 풀이 좀 써주시죠?"

기묘한 기연으로 한 몸 살이를 하게 된
천재 마법사 엘릭과 원죄의 마왕 메피스토펠레스.

마법 불능 엘릭이 가보 '마도 경식'의 힘을 빌어
메피스토의 흑마법을 뒤집고 그 힘을 흡수해버린
명실상부 갑을 관계!

하지만,
엘릭은 메피스토의 힘을 최대한 흡수해 강해지려 하고
메피스토는 자신의 기운을 최대한 불어넣어 지배하려 하고...
실상은 서로가 갑이자 을일 수밖에 없는 운명.
마도 명문 메르빙거 가의 재건을 꿈꾸는 엘릭과
엘릭의 몸을 지배해 다시금 고귀한 마왕으로 부활하려는 메피스토의
'동상이몽 마족삼킴 어드벤쳐'

"좋게 좋게 가시죠?"
"하찮은 인간 따위에게... 굴복할 것 같으냐!!!"

ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 黄金の風
黄金の風

altTitles.ja: ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 第5部 黄金の風 カラー版

altTitles.en: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part 5 - Vento Aureo - Digital Colored Comics

description.en: The highly-acclaimed fifth arc of Hirohiko Araki’s JoJo’s Bizarre Adventure shifts the action from Japan to Italy, as Koichi Hirose heads to Europe to find an aspiring gangster named Giorno Giovanna, the secret son of Dio Brando, scourge of the Joestar family. Organized crime meets family drama and unbelievable enemy Stands in JoJo’s Bizarre Adventure: Part 5—Golden Wind!
description.it:
Napoli, 2001. Giorno Giovana è un piccolo criminale con il grande sogno di diventare una "Gang-Star". Giorno ha una connessione con la linea sanguigna Joestar, e possiede lo stand "Gold Experience". Il suo sogno inizia a diventare realtà quando incontra Bruno Bucciarati, un partecipante della gang "Passione" e un portatore di stand. Giunti alla conclusione che tutti e due hanno idee simili, e che unanimamente non concordano sugli affari della gang, Giorno rivela il suo obiettivo: con l'aiuto di Bruno, riformerà Passione spodestando il capo della gang.

Giorno, una volta diventato membro di Passione ed entrato nella squadra di Bucciarati, scopre che non è una semplice gang, è piena di portatori di stand. Una volta confrontatesi con le altre squadre, sleali e imprevedibili, scoprono che il loro obiettivo di cambiare la gang dall'interno non sarà facile da raggiungere. Parlando a proposito di questi avversari, Gioeno tenta di ralire tra i ranghi per avvicinarsi al boss, un uomo circondato dal mistero.

description.en:
Living by selling information about monsters, Maeng Siwoo is considered completely useless in the hunter industry without any standout qualities. However, he fiercely battles to provide for his sick younger sibling.

One fateful day, he is gifted a mysterious smartphone by a transcendent being within a dungeon, appointing him as the channel manager for such beings. Upon subscribing to the channel, he unlocks the ability to wield the powers of the gods.
description.pt-br:
Vivendo da venda de informações sobre monstros, Maeng Siwoo é considerado completamente inútil na indústria de caçadores, sem quaisquer qualidades de destaque. No entanto, ele luta ferozmente para sustentar seu irmão mais novo doente.

Um dia fatídico, ele recebe um misterioso smartphone de um ser transcendente dentro de uma masmorra, nomeando-o como gerente de canal de tais seres. Ao se inscrever no canal, ele desbloqueia a habilidade de exercer os poderes dos deuses.

title.en: Itsumo Baka ni shitekuru Bishoujo-tachi to Zetsuen shitara, Jitsu wa Ore no Koto ga Daisuki Datta you da.

altTitles.ja: いつも馬鹿にしてくる美少女たちと絶縁したら、実は俺のことが大好きだったようだ。

altTitles.en: When I Isolated Myself From the Beautiful Girls Who Always Make Fun of Me, I Think They Actually Loved Me.
I Cut Ties With the Beauties That Always Made Fun of Me, but It Seems That They Actually Love Me.

description.en:
"I want to break up with you." 

In the winter of his first year of high school. Yuta Miyamoto, who tries to be "kind to others," was told by his girlfriend, Yumi Asakawa, that she had to break up with him. While he is still recovering from his broken heart, Akane Kurosaki, a junior, calls him "unable to get a girlfriend," and Ruriri, his favorite maid, calls him "like a slave". Yuta, fed up with the situation, declares his intention to break off relations with all three, but the reaction is not what he expected!

altTitles.ja: サキュバスがやってきたお話

altTitles.en: The Story of a Succubus Who Came to the Human World

description.en: The story of a Succubus who comes to the human world to absorb life force energy. Accidentally, she lives as a child in a strange man's house.

altTitles.ja: 絶頂島の姫

description.en: Yui, a high school girl is abducted to a lonely Island in the middle of the ocean. Eight childhood friends of her who were raised in the same orphanage are gathered on that island too. Now that she meets them again for the first time in a long time, they've all become first rate criminals!! Moreover, a device makes Yui experience intense arousal at regular intervals, and if they don't make her come she will die. And there are further secrets on that Island: continuous arousal crime suspense!!
description.ja: 絶海の孤島に拉致された女子高生・結衣。その島には、同じ孤児院で育った８人の幼馴染も集められていた。久しぶりに会う彼らは全員、今や一級犯罪者!!　更に結衣の体は定期的に発情し、彼らにイかせてもらわないと死に至る仕掛けが!!　彼らの中から一人を選べば島から脱出できるといわれた結衣。しかしこの島には更なる秘密が…!?　話題沸騰！　連続発情クライムサスペンス！

description.en:
The main character, Siwoo Lee, lost his parents to a murderer ten years ago. Finally, he meets Jack, the killer who killed his parents, and beheads him. “It wasn’t me who killed your parents.”
After learning that the real culprit is a "contractor" belonging to a group of killers using superpowers, Si-woo Lee decides to hunt down the registrants with Jack’s help.

altTitles.ja: 灼熱カバディ

description.en:
The story centres on first-year high school student Tatsuya Yoigoshi, a former ace soccer player who dislikes sports. 
He gets invited to join the team for an Indian contact sport called Kabaddi. 
He scoffs at the idea at first but becomes interested after watching a kabaddi practice.

altTitles.ja: サタノファニ

description.en: A mysterious syndrome turns schoolgirls into homicidal monsters behind numerous atrocities in Japan. However, nothing is what it seems and when Chika Amagi is arrested for the brutal murder of five people, a journey into uncharted, troubled waters begins!
description.es: Un misterioso síndrome convierte a las colegialas en monstruos homicidas detrás de numerosas atrocidades en Japón. Sin embargo, nada es lo que parece y cuando Chika Amagi es arrestado por el brutal asesinato de cinco personas, ¡comienza un viaje a aguas desconocidas y turbulentas!
description.fr:
Au Japon, un mystérieux syndrome transforme les écolières d'un établissement en monstres sanguinaires, capables de tuer leurs semblables avec un sang-froid incroyable. Dans cette période de trouble, Chika Amagi, étudiante sans histoire, est arrêtée pour le meurtre terrible de cinq personnes…   


---
description.pt-br: Uma síndrome misteriosa torna jovens garotas em monstros homicidas por trás de diversas atrocidades no Japão. Entretanto, nada é o que parece quando Chika Amagai é presa pelo assassinato brutal de cinco pessoas e é levada a uma prisão em uma ilha para estas assassinas!

altTitles.ja: フィルター越しのカノジョ

altTitles.en: Secret Girl Through the Filter

description.en: Hakobe Narumi is an expressionless high schooler known as Stoney. The highlight of his unnoticeable existence is following posts from the popular selfie poster "Efa" on social media. But it turns out "Efa" is his studious and popular classmate Mitsuha Koto?! The slightly erotic, adolescent, selfie, romantic comedy between an Iron Walled Selfie girl and a stone-faced boy begins!
description.ja: つねに無表情な能面高校生・箱部成海。クラスでも存在感激うすな彼の人生の楽しみは、SNSで人気のえっちな自撮り女子「えふぁ」の投稿を追いかけること。しかし、その「えふぁ」の正体が、真面目で誰からも好かれるクラスメイトの三葉琴であることを知ってしまいーー⁉︎鉄壁自撮り女子✖️能面男子のちょっとえっちな青春自撮りラブコメ開幕‼︎
description.ru: Хакобэ Наруми — невыразительный старшеклассник по прозвищу «Каменнолицый». Его незаметное существование состоит в том, что он следит за постами популярного эротического аккаунта «Эфа» в соцсетях. Но оказывается, что «Эфа» — это его одноклассница Мицуха Кото! Начинается слегка эротическая, подростковая, селфи-романтическая комедия между селфи-девочкой с железной стеной и парнем с каменным лицом!

altTitles.ja: マネマネ にちにち

description.en: In a certain school lies a certain club and its three managers. Though unremarkable, days that can't be found anywhere else have begun! Drawn by Yamamoto Souichiro is a brand new Sports ground youth story!
description.tl: Sa isang partikular na paaralan ay may isang natatanging klab at ang tatlong tagapamahala nito. Bagama't hindi kapansin-pansin, ay nagsimula na ang mga araw na kahit saan ay hindi matatagpuan! Iginuhit ni Souichiro Yamamoto, ay isang bagong kuwento ng mga kabataan sa larangan ng isports!
description.pt-br: Numa determinada escola reside um determinado clube e as suas três ajudantes. Embora normais, dias que não podem ser encontrados em nenhum outro lugar começaram! Desenhado por Yamamoto Souichirou, é uma nova história juvenil de campo esportivo!

description.de:
Alle Schurken sind besiegt und die Helden haben die Welt gerettet. Das klingt erst einmal gut, doch sind wirklich alle Helden gut? Nicht alle, die sich „Helden“ nennen, verhalten sich auch so: Eine Frau, deren Schwester von einem dieser „Helden“ getötet wurde, begibt sich auf die Mission, den Täter zu finden, und wird zum „Hero-Killer“, der jede Nacht Jagd auf korrupte Helden macht. Kann sie es schaffen, ihre Schwester zu rächen und die Welt zu einem besseren Ort zu machen?

description.en:
The world is in constant turmoil, with constant wars breaking out between Heroes and Villains.

Gifted with supernatural abilities, one lone girl sets out on a bloody path for revenge against the injustices of the world she lives in. With the constant clashes between titans, no one is safe.

If no one is willing to protect the innocent, who are the real heroes, and who are the real villains? What truly separates one from the other?

El mundo está en constante agitación, con guerras constantes desatándose entre héroes y villanos. Dotada con habilidades extraordinarias, una chica solitaria recorre un camino sangriento de venganza contra las injusticias del mundo en el que vive. Con los enfrentamientos constantes entre los titanes, nadie está a salvo. Si nadie está dispuesto a proteger a los inocentes, ¿quiénes son los verdaderos héroes? ¿Quiénes son los verdaderos villanos? ¿Qué es lo que realmente separa a los unos de los otros?

Dotée de capacités surnaturelles, Ehwa, une jeune fille solitaire, s'engage sur un chemin sanglant afin de se venger pour sa soeur qui a été tuée par un "héros". A világ állandó kavarodásban van, állandó háborúk törnek ki a Hősök és a Gonoszok között. Természetfölötti képességekkel felruházva egy magányos lány véres útra indul, hogy bosszút álljon a világ igazságtalanságai ellen, amelyben él. Ha senki sem hajlandó megvédeni az ártatlanokat, kik az igazi hősök és kik az igazi gonosztevők? Mi választja el igazán a másikat?

description.id:
Bertahun-tahun yang lalu, Ehwa kehilangan saudara perempuan karena seorang hero yang tidak dikenal. Sampai sekarang, tidak ada yang tahu siapa pembunuh saudara perempuan Ehwa. Tetapi hal itu tidak masalah baginya, karena dia akan menghabisi semua hero yang ada di dunia.

---
Perang berakhir dengan kekalahan para villain. Sekarang dunia dikuasai oleh Hero yang korup. Dan Salah satu Hero tersebut membunuh saudara perempuan Ehwa. dia tidak tahu yang mana, tapi tidak masalah. Jika dia membunuh satu per satu, mereka akan ada di antara mereka. Ehwa menjadi Hero killer, Villain yang memburu para Hero setiap malam. "Aku akan membunuh semua orang dan akan mengambil semuanya!"

Il mondo è in costante fermento, con continue guerre scoppiate tra eroi e cattivi. Dotata di abilità soprannaturali, una ragazza solitaria intraprende un percorso sanguinoso per vendicarsi contro le ingiustizie del mondo in cui vive. Con i continui scontri tra titani, nessuno è al sicuro. Se nessuno è disposto a proteggere gli innocenti, chi sono i veri eroi e chi sono i veri cattivi? Cosa separa veramente l'uno dall'altro?

description.ko:
전쟁은 빌런들의 패배로 막을 내렸다.
이제 세상은 부패한 히어로들이 지배하고 있다.
그리고, 그런 히어로들 중 하나가 이화의 언니를 죽였다.
언니를 죽인 게 누구인지는 모르지만 상관없다.
한 놈씩 죽이다 보면 그중에 있을 테니까.
이화는 매일 밤 영웅들을 사냥하는 빌런, 히어로 킬러가 된다.
​
한 악당의 지독한 액션 활극.
“모조리 죽이고, 빼앗아 주마!”

altTitles.en: A Couple of Cuckoos

altTitles.th: รักอลวนคนสลับบ้าน

description.en: Nagi Umino was mistakenly switched at birth, and now attends a prestigious private high school. One day, he has a chance meeting with Erika Amano, an incredibly high society highschool girl who claims she's on the way to meet her fiancé, and who asks/forces him to be her fake boyfriend. Neither of them, at the time, understood the significance of their meeting for Erika was the girl Nagi was switched at birth with, and Nagi was Erika's soon-to-be fiancé! The curtain raises on a romantic comedy of intertwined fates that begins with being switched at birth!
description.es: Una comedia romántica sobre Nagi yendo a una reunión con sus verdaderos padres, y sobre Erika, que está atormentada por un compromiso no deseado!
description.fr: Nagi est un élève sérieux passionné par ses études. Un jour, alors qu'il est en deuxième année, il découvre qu'il a été échangé à la naissance avec une fille. Espérant garder leurs enfants biologiques et adoptifs, leurs parents décident qu'ils vont se fiancer pour pouvoir rester en famille. Mais Nagi est déjà amoureux d'une autre fille...
description.it: Nagi Umino, studente al secondo anno di una prestigiosa scuola preparatoria, ha scoperto di essere un bambino scambiato alla nascita. Un giorno, mentre si sta dirigendo all'incontro con i suoi veri genitori, incontra Erika Amano, una strana ragazza promessa in sposa nonostante la giovane età. Rifiutando di sposarsi, costringe Nagi a far finta di essere il suo ragazzo per cercare di far desistere i genitori dall'idea del matrimonio. Nagi e Erika scopriranno di avere molto più in comune di quanto pensino!
description.ja: 赤ちゃんの頃に取り違えられ、今は名門私立に通う高校 2年の海野凪。ある日、これから許嫁に会いにいくという超お嬢様女子高生・天野エリカと偶然出会い、彼氏のフリをしてくれと半ば強引に頼まれてしまう。だが、その時の二人は知る由もなかった。エリカは凪と取り違えられた子どもで、凪はエリカの許嫁相手だということを……。
description.ru: Романтическая комедия о Наги, идущем на встречу со своими настоящими родителями, и о Эрике, которая мучается из-за нежеланной помолвки!..
description.pt-br: Uma comédia romântica sobre Nagi que está indo se encontrar com seus verdadeiros pais e sobre Erika, que é atormentada por um casamento indesejado!

altTitles.ja: 今日、好きっていいます

altTitles.en: Today, I Will Say I Love You

description.en:
University student, Rintarou, is in love with his rental boyfriend, Asahi. Knowing that it is all pretend doesn't stop his heart from racing when confronted by Asahi's kindness. Every time they meet, his feelings continue to grow stronger.
One day, as Rintarou finds himself unable to make another rental appointment out of concern he won't be able to stop his feelings from growing, he stumbples across Asahi in town. While Rintarou is taken aback by the uncharacteristically serious look on Asahi's face, Asahi starts leaning in for a kiss...?!

Fifth chapter is a completed oneshot known as KOI WA KITSUNE MOUYOU.
